channel.title: Data-structure on Lucas Xu
channel.description: Recent content in Data-structure on Lucas Xu

item.title: Linked List
item.description: What is a Linked List? A linked list is a linear data structure where each element is a separate object. It is a collection of nodes. Each element (node) of a list is comprising of two items: the data and a reference to the next node (Singly linked list). A doubly linked list is a list that has two references, one to the next node and another previous node.

item.title: 链表
item.description: 什么是链表 链表是有一连串结点（链表中的元素称为结点），每个结点由两部分组成，一个是储存数据元素的数据域，另一个是储存下一个结点地址的指针域。
